newsitem.title: USA: Citation Computer Systems Q3 Dec 31 loss.
newsitem.headline: Citation Computer Systems Q3 Dec 31 loss.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: 1996 Q3 operating loss of $0.24 a share excludes one-time costs equal to $0.09 a share from canceled secondary stock offering and loss from U.K. operations equal to $0.10 a share.
1995 Q3 profit includes office consolidation and related costs of $58,000.
1995 Q3 operating profit of $0.22 a share excludes charges from restructuring Madison unit of $0.01 a share and gain from U.K. operations of $0.04 a share.
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: 1996 nine months operating profit of $0.35 a share excludes charges from restructuring U.K operations of $0.63 a share and secondary offering expense of $0.09 a share.
1995 nine months operating profit of $0.44 a share excludes charges from restructuring of Madison unit of $0.17 a share and charges from restructuring U.K. operations of $0.10 a share.
